trans-unit.source: Exposes a <xref:System.IO.Stream> around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: Espone un <xref:System.IO.Stream>di una named pipe, che supporta sincrone e asincrone di lettura e operazioni di scrittura.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients.
trans-unit.target: Le named pipe forniscono pipe unidirezionale o duplex per la comunicazione tra un server di pipe e uno o più client pipe.

trans-unit.source: Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network.
trans-unit.target: Named pipe possono essere utilizzate per la comunicazione interprocesso localmente o in una rete.

trans-unit.source: A single pipe name can be shared by multiple NamedPipeClientStream objects.
trans-unit.target: Un solo nome di pipe può essere condiviso da più oggetti NamedPipeClientStream.

trans-unit.source: Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi processo può fungere da server named pipe o client o entrambi.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], un massimo di 10 pipe possa connettersi contemporaneamente attraverso la rete.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> classe con il nome di pipe specificato.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the following default values: - A default server name of ".".
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore utilizza i valori predefiniti seguenti:-il nome server predefinito ".".

trans-unit.source: - A default <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.

trans-unit.target: -Un predefinito <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>valore <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>

trans-unit.source: - A default <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> value of <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: -Un predefinito <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>valore <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: - A default <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: -Un predefinito <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>valore <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.target: pipeNameis .

trans-unit.source: pipeName is a zero-length string.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the handle was opened asynchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che l'handle è stato aperto in modo asincrono; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la pipe sia connessa; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe and server names, and the specified pipe options, security impersonation level, and inheritability mode.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> classe con i nomi della pipe e del server e le opzioni di pipe specificato, il livello di rappresentazione di sicurezza e la modalità di ereditarietà.

trans-unit.source: The pipe direction for this constructor is determined by the `desiredAccessRights` parameter.
trans-unit.target: La direzione della pipe per questo costruttore è determinata dal `desiredAccessRights` parametro.

trans-unit.source: If the `desiredAccessRights` value is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Se il `desiredAccessRights` valore è <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, la direzione della pipe sarà <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di `desiredAccessRights` è <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, la direzione della pipe sarà <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` includes both <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> and <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di `desiredAccessRights` include entrambi <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>e <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>la direzione della pipe sarà <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote computer to connect to, or "." to specify the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del computer remoto a cui connettersi, o "." per specificare il computer locale.

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della pipe.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the desired access rights of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica i diritti di accesso desiderato della pipe.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che determina come aprire o creare la pipe.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the security impersonation level.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che determina il livello di rappresentazione di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle will be inheritable by child processes.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che determina se l'handle sottostante sarà ereditabile dai processi figlio.

trans-unit.target: pipeNameor serverName is .

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Si connette a un server in attesa con un valore di timeout infinito.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29> method with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>metodo con un valore di timeout infinito.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo attende per un'istanza di pipe diventi disponibile.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>potrebbe restituire prima <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>viene chiamato dal <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>oggetto, ma <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>non restituirà finché <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>ha restituito.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i dati scritti nella pipe dopo un <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>è connesso l'oggetto, ma prima della chiamata <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, saranno disponibili per il server dopo la chiamata a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: Il client è già connesso.

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.
trans-unit.target: Si connette a un server in attesa entro il periodo di timeout specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo attende per un'istanza di pipe diventi disponibile.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>potrebbe restituire prima <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>viene chiamato dal <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>, ma <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>non restituirà finché <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>ha restituito.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the `timeout` parameter to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> to specify an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il `timeout` parametro <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>per specificare un valore di timeout infinito.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i dati scritti nella pipe dopo un <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>è connesso l'oggetto, ma prima della chiamata <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, saranno disponibili per il server dopo la chiamata a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di millisecondi di attesa per il server di rispondere prima del timeout connessione.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile connettersi al server interno specificato timeout periodo.

trans-unit.source: timeout is less than 0 and not set to .
trans-unit.target: timeoutè minore di 0 e non è impostata su .

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: Il client è già connesso.

trans-unit.source: The server is connected to another client and the time-out period has expired.
trans-unit.target: Il server è connesso a un altro client e il periodo di timeout è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server with an infinite timeout period.
trans-unit.target: In modo asincrono si connette a un server in attesa con un periodo di timeout infinito.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: Operazione di connessione di un'attività che rappresenta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Si connette in modo asincrono a un server in attesa entro il periodo di timeout specificato.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di millisecondi di attesa per il server di rispondere prima del timeout connessione.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: Operazione di connessione di un'attività che rappresenta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Si connette a un server in attesa e monitora le richieste di annullamento in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Token da monitorare per le richieste di annullamento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: Operazione di connessione di un'attività che rappresenta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Si connette a un server in attesa entro il periodo di timeout specificato e monitora le richieste di annullamento in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di millisecondi di attesa per il server di rispondere prima del timeout connessione.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Token da monitorare per le richieste di annullamento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: Operazione di connessione di un'attività che rappresenta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia risorse non gestite ed esegue altre operazioni di pulizia prima che il <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> istanza venga recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di istanze del server che condividono lo stesso nome di pipe.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the number of server instances for the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has a handle to or is connected to.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce il numero di istanze del server per il <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>che l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>oggetto dispone di un handle o è connesso a.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se il corrente <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>oggetto non è ancora connesso a un server di named pipe, o se l'handle di pipe corrente non è stata impostata, questa proprietà genera un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di istanze del server che condividono lo stesso nome di pipe.

trans-unit.source: The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: L'handle di pipe non è stato impostato.

trans-unit.source: -or- The current <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> object has not yet connected to a <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - corrente <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> oggetto non è ancora connesso a un <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: La pipe è interrotta oppure si è verificato un errore dei / o.

trans-unit.source: The underlying pipe handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: L'handle di pipe sottostante viene chiuso.
